programme.desc: As three men travel across Taiwan, expect world-class itineraries, the best local culture, and wining & dining, enjoyed with friends.

programme.title: Tuesday Report: Where The Tides Meet Ep02
programme.desc: As a maritime nation, livelihoods in Singapore are inextricably linked to the sea. This three-part series captures the ecological changes in the sea which affects fish-rearing activities.

programme.title: Body SOS S10 Ep15
programme.desc: Delve into various health issues & debunk myths at this 'medical court', where a jury of artists share their thoughts & raise questions throughout trials with the judges - medical experts.

programme.title: National Heritage Ep03
programme.desc: Rediscover Malaysian folk stories through the eyes of master shadow puppet master Yang, Awang Batil of Malay Teater Tradisional Awang Batil & Malaysian cartoonist LAT.

programme.desc: Host Guo Liang delves into the lives of famed artists Li Nan Xing, Zoe Tay, Fann Wong & other stars as they head backstage together.

programme.title: James's Going Places S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Taiwan's famed host, James, takes you on a market adventure packed with local delicacies. Join foodies experts to reconnect with nostalgic flavours you've never forgotten.

programme.title: Evening Edition Ep13
programme.desc: Catch the latest local & international news headlines as depicted in major newspaper & magazines, each from a range of different perspectives.

programme.title: Performers Ep02
programme.desc: Ang Siew Kim, better known as Hong Jie Jie, began her journey in Chinese children's theatre in 1999. Now, 22 years later, her passion continues to burn brighter than her misgivings.

programme.title: Get Fit With Me S7 Ep11
programme.desc: Let's stay healthy by working out even though we have to stay home. Sport experts share exercise tips & routines, complete with step-by-step tutorials.

programme.desc: Malaysia's highest-rated Chinese singing competition comes back strong! The production team & top 16 contestants are unlocking their infinite potential to make this flagship show happen.

programme.title: iWalker Ep50
programme.desc: Join the hosts Jason & Vicky as they travel across Taiwan's Taipei, Kee Long, Tai Nan & Yi Lan, discovering beautiful destinations & great food along the way.

programme.title: My Star Guide S14 Ep10
programme.desc: A new season begins with our celebrities, Guo Liang, Chen Li Ping, Quan Yi Fong, Joanne Peh & friends. Come on trips around the world, filled with delicious food & gorgeous sights!

programme.desc: In this infotainment-reality show, one notable Singaporean participant travels the world playing various traditional foreign games.

programme.title: National Heritage Ep03
programme.desc: Rediscover Malaysian folk stories through the eyes of master shadow puppet master Yang, Awang Batil of Malay Teater Tradisional Awang Batil & Malaysian cartoonist LAT.

programme.desc: A man gets possessed by a ghost to take revenge on its murderer.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, director Lo Wei plays a fishing village bully, whose son lusts after a local beauty.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: From writer director Pan Lei comes this Chinese variation of Henry King's famous 1950's film about a persecuted swordsman.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: A young couple lived happily in a house but the woman becomes haunted after she accidentally kills her husband.

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: As the aggressive Chin Empire conquers the Chao Kingdom and drains the Wei empire, adventure, intrigue and tragedy abound as the armies march into battle.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Directed by Chow Sze Loke and Li Han Hsiang, this classic starring Diana Chang, Chang Chung and Pai Yun depicts how Lotus Pan marries a midget, yet has an affair.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: When Fang returns from the U.S. to see Rose but starts eyeing her old friend's fiance, Rose shows that she has a thorny side.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays a beauty tricked into sacrificing herself for the good of the Chinese people. However, the truth is revealed too late.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: Veteran director Yen Chun excels in this tale of the Dragon Sword and the evil Security Agency, beautiful swordswomen and bandits who want it.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: Betty Loh, Grace Ting and Diana Chang star in this romantic comedy between a gifted scholar and the administrative official's daughter he falls for at first sight.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: Veteran Yueh Feng made this 'Martial Arts World' saga of a masked master of the 'Black Sand Hand Technique,' starring Lily Ho in a dual role.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This drama takes on a group of young people who get entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: This tragic tale depicts the life of Fang Pi Yu, a singer whose husband dies in his attempt to free her from her past, and whose father-in-law throws her out.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: This Yuan Dynasty tale tells of the Sacred Fire sect, Wu Tang clan, O Mei's disciples, a sacred book, and the destruction of Shaolin.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Be tickled by the slippery efforts of three pickpockets, so adept at their chosen skill that they even manage to fleece three beauties of their underwear!

programme.title: Heroes of Sung
programme.desc: In this period action film, Meng Hung (Shih Szu) must work with Fan Tien-Fu (Lo Lieh) to protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: A young woman's life turns tragic after she discovers that she's adopted and then goes in search of her real mother.

programme.title: Facets of Love
programme.desc: In this king of epic dramas, three sexy vignettes are set against a Ming Dynasty brothel that steams with erotic myths, secret trysts and pleasurable twists.

programme.title: Trilogy of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: It's three times the substance, style and stars, in this amazing motion picture featuring the work of three of Shaw Brother's finest martial arts directors.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Hsuan sets out to apprehend George Eaton, a high profile thug who has escaped to Hong Kong. With home support, can Yang take him down?

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Set in the Warring States period of ancient China, this drama tells the story of Nieh Cheng, one of history's greatest political assassins.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Alexander Fu stars as a young carriage driver who finds love and encounters peril after he rescues a girl from being harassed by a dangerous group.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: The story of the Shaolin Temple's betrayal by the White-Browed Hermit and Shaolin hothead Fong Sai-yuk's revenge bid gets retold again.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Pat Ting Hung, Carrie Ku Mei and Li Hsiang Chun star in this delightful tale of mistaken identities caused by monogrammed handkerchiefs.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: Actress Lily Ho plays the feared swordswoman Silver Fox, who witnessed her father senseless maiming and her mother's rape. 18 years later, it's payback time.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: A hothead (Wang Chung) is tempted by the dark side in this coming-of-age tale which centres on c. 1970s lower-class Hong Kong teens.

programme.title: The Tigress of Shaolin
programme.desc: Hui Ying-hung co-stars with Liu Chia-yung in this fast-paced comedy that features the outrageous Leprosy Boxing style.

programme.title: That Man in Chang-an
programme.desc: Yan Jun stars in this romantic Han dynasty adventure epic as a dying emperor alongside an evil queen, amidst plots and counterplots galore!

programme.title: The Sinking City : Capsule Odyssey
programme.desc: A group of people fight for their ideal lifestyles as they share a small living space called "Space Capsule". Starring Pakho Chao, Louis Cheung & Andrew Lam.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: When a bribery trial is delayed after the defendant absconds & only witness goes missing, the ICAC launches a full-scale operation to track them down.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk
programme.desc: Tasked to protect the community from monsters, a mystic monk has to seek divine intervention when the Emperor abruptly dies, and dark forces threaten the world!

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: A demon sealed by a Taoist medium in a fish is released when a group of kids catches the demon fish and brings it home.

programme.title: Weeds on Fire
programme.desc: This award-winning film reveals the true story of Hong Kong's first youth baseball team, who miraculously defeats a powerful rival to become champions

programme.title: Shock Wave
programme.desc: Superstar Andy Lau stars as a bomb specialist set on capturing a wanted criminal called Blast in this action-drama. However, will he be able to do it in time when Blast threatens a massacre?

programme.title: Cook Up a Storm
programme.desc: Nicholas Tse & Jung Yong Hwa helm this blockbuster filmed in Guangzhou, Macau & Europe, about a Cantonese cook who takes on a Michelin-starred rival for a prestigious title.

programme.title: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No Words
programme.desc: Golden Horse Award winner for 'Best Visual Effects, this saga captures how a race begins when a former antiquarian goes in search of the lost, coveted Scripture with No Words.

programme.title: A Nail Clipper Romance
programme.desc: Starring Zhou Dong Yu & Joseph Chang, this comedy depicts a young man falling in love with a girl who only eats nail clippers!

programme.title: The Thousand Faces of Dunjia
programme.desc: Scripted and produced by Tsui Hark, this fantasy film depicts a group of warriors protecting the world from a monster invasion. Starring Zhou Dong Yu, Aarif Lee & Ni Ni.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: David Ki was a top rock climber in Asia - until an accident left him wheelchair bound. With unyielding courage and tenacity, David is back to scaling dizzy heights and conquering Lion Rock!

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: Directed by Dante Lam and starring Zhang Yi, Huang Jing Yu & Du Jiang, this military saga depicts a Chinese naval commando unit that intercepts terrorists to save Chinese citizens in Yemen.

programme.title: The Sleep Curse
programme.desc: After two cult classic films from the 90s - director Herman Yau & Anthony Wong reunite, and together with Gordon Lam, Michelle Wai & Jojo Goh, challenge your limit in this paranormal thriller.

programme.title: Old Cow vs Tender Grass
programme.desc: At 49, Singaporean taxi driver Moo is still trying to find love. His life seems set to change when he meets the young, but eccentric Moon, an avid animal lover. Are they meant to be?

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: A young innocent girl is betrayed by her loved ones & decides to take control of her life by becoming a gangster. Starring China's famed actors, Raquel Xu & Emotion Cheung.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: Yu Feng & Liang Liang's puppy is gravely injured while defending them from their neighbour's aggressive dog but sadly, the neighbour refuses to take responsibility.

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Nick Cheung wrote and directed this Hong Kong crime thriller about a prolific and accomplished undercover cop who has no qualms in risking his life to take down the leader of a mysterious criminal group.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: When the windshield of an airplane shatters at 30,000 feet in the air, the pilot and the crew attempt the impossible. Based on the miraculous landing of Sichuan Airlines flight 8633.

programme.title: A Chinese Odyssey Pt 2 Cinderella
programme.desc: After Joker (Stephen Chow) goes back 500 years, he runs into a myriad of oddball characters, including the Longevity Monk.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: A woman is left by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. While finding her feet in her father's restaurant, she gets attracted to the new chef, a free spirit who helps liberate her.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: When MMA Diva Xin Lan suffers a defeat to He Hua and loses her father's club, an injured Xin Lan seeks out a retired fighting legend to help reclaim her honour.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: The Paws-Men are protectors of dogs but they encounter a host of challenges. They do, however, get to witness true friendships between dogs and humans. Starring Tats Lau, Chan Lai Wun & Bob Lam.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: This action crime drama stars Donnie Yen & Andy Lau as a drug kingpin and a corrupt policeman who team up to build an underworld empire in 1960s Hong Kong.

programme.title: Seabok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a mission to protect Seobok, the first-ever human clone who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity.

programme.title: The Yuppie Fantasia 3
programme.desc: Challenges in Leung Foon's life turn him into a chauvinist who hates himself. However, the arrival of his daughter spells a second chance at redemption.

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A bank robber must navigate a dangerous series of complications to get out of the game.

programme.title: 12 Rounds 3: Lockdown
programme.desc: When detective John Shaw uncovers evidence linking his fellow officers to a murder, they frame him for a homicide he didn't commit.

programme.title: Brahms: the Boy II
programme.desc: Unaware of the terrifying history of Heelshire Mansion, a young family moves into a guest house on the estate where their young son soon makes an unsettling new friend.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Feature adaptation of Beatrix Potter's classic tale of a rebellious rabbit trying to sneak into a farmer's vegetable garden.

programme.title: Bride Wars
programme.desc: Two best friends find themselves in a no-holds-barred battle when a clerical error causes a clash in wedding dates for the same wedding venue.

programme.title: Zathura: a Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: 30-something Mike O'Donnell is given a second shot at life when he is miraculously transformed back to the age of 17.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Christopher Nolan directs an exceptional cast in this sci-fi action film that travels around the globe and into the intimate and infinite world of dreams.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: The G.I. Joes must once again face their mortal enemy Cobra while contending with threats within the government.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the world's smartest, bravest, and highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Denzel Washington returns as Robert McCall, serving an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed but this time it's personal.

programme.title: Wild Mountain Thyme
programme.desc: Two star-crossed lovers in Ireland get caught up in their family's land dispute as John Patrick Shanley, who created the classic Moonstruck, brings his sweeping romantic vision to the Emerald Isle.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

programme.title: Force of Nature
programme.desc: Disgraced cop, Cardillo, join forces with Dr. Troy and her retired detective father to battle a gang of thieves and escape before the entire city is deep underwater.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the charming, younger brother of her wealthy boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahassee, Wichita, and Little Rock move to the American heartland as they face off against evolved zombies, fellow survivors, and the growing pains of the snarky makeshift family.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: the Squeakquel
programme.desc: After a concert mishap, the singing chipmunks take a break from superstardom and go to school to fit in with kids their age.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: After a farmer's daughter saves a baby pig from the axe, the piglet befriends a spider who spins webs of miracles to keep the pig alive.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo!: Return to Zombie Island
programme.desc: Join Scooby-Doo, Shaggy and the Mystery Inc. gang as they win a vacation of a lifetime and soon find out that paradise comes with a price when they encounter an army of zombies.

programme.title: Like a Boss
programme.desc: Two female friends with very different ideals decide to start a beauty company together. One is more practical, while the other wants to earn her fortune and live a lavish lifestyle.

programme.title: Wild Mountain Thyme
programme.desc: Two star-crossed lovers in Ireland get caught up in their family's land dispute as John Patrick Shanley, who created the classic Moonstruck, brings his sweeping romantic vision to the Emerald Isle.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: An international naval coalition becomes the world's last hope for survival as they engage a hostile alien force in this epic action-adventure.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

programme.title: Johnny English

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Based on true events in the Battle of Midway, the film tells story of the leaders and soldiers who used their instincts, fortitude, and bravery to overcome the odds during World War II.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep08
programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.desc: In this new season, join TVB artists as they show you how to maximize short holidays in Finland, Hawaii, Okinawa, Shanghai, Chiang Mai, Bangkok, Kenting, Norway and Malta.

programme.title: Kids' Lives Matter Ep20
programme.desc: This star-studded drama features Kevin Cheng, Kenneth Ma and Linda Chung as pediatricians. Two pediatric specialists set their differences aside as they bond over a shared mission to help sick children.

programme.title: Take Two Ep20
programme.desc: Sze Kwong, an engineer, mysteriously travels back in time to before a tragic building collapse took his life. As he struggles to save everyone, a shocking conspiracy begins to surface.

programme.title: Lo and Behold Ep1415
programme.desc: Revolving around the Hung family, this long-running, award-winning TVB sitcom reflects on life today and how love and humour can bridge the generation gap.

programme.title: Story of Yanxi Palace Ep65
programme.desc: Charmaine Sheh stars in this mega-hit drama depicting a street-smart girl who rises in the ranks to become one the Qing Emperor's favourite concubines as she seeks the truth behind her sister's death.

programme.desc: This news bulletin keeps you ahead with breaking HK and international news, current affairs, finance, sports, weather and traffic updates.

programme.desc: Revolving around the Hung family, this long-running, award-winning TVB sitcom reflects on life today and how love and humour can bridge the generation gap.

programme.title: Chronicle of a Blood Merchant
programme.desc: Set in the 1960's after the Korean War, a couple is happily married for 11 years until a rumor spreads around the village that the man isn't the real father of their eldest son......

programme.title: Lover'S Concerto
programme.desc: Anonymous love letters keep coming to Ji-hwan, refreshing his memories 5 years ago of two long-lost best friends, but when love rushed in, who will be left behind?

programme.title: Sunny
programme.desc: A group of girlfriends once inseparable in their teens reunite years later when they realize one of them is terminally ill.

programme.title: On Your Wedding Day
programme.desc: A bittersweet love story that chronicles a couple who met in high school and their relationship over the course of 10 years.

programme.title: Love+Sling
programme.desc: Despite having zero interest in the sport, Sung-woong trains to become a top wrestler with his dad's enthusiastic support. When the girl he likes falls for his dad, they begin wrestling for love.

programme.title: Like for Likes
programme.desc: An arrogant top star and a fussy screenwriter, a meddling chef and a homeless flight attendant, a deaf composer and TV drama producer. They learn to navigate the modern dating world via social media.

programme.title: Feng Shui
programme.desc: A fengshui expert, Park Jae-Sang, who can determine the land that bring good fortune and people around him compete to occupy the land in order to change their fate and become king.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: In order to maintain peace, a ruthless detective and his ragtag team plan to take down the most feared Chinese gangster in Seoul.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: A former arm-wrestling champion raised in the U.S. returns to South Korea for a tournament, but he finds his life complicated by the appearance of the biological family he never knew.

programme.title: Memoir of a Murderer
programme.desc: A retired serial killer with Alzheimer's disease who killed those who have committed sins 'equally worse' fights to protect his daughter from her psychotic boyfriend.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: The story of the bizarre King Hwanghae and a look-a-like peasant, who stands in for the monarch when the King faces the threat of assassination.

programme.title: Master
programme.desc: An intellectual crime investigation team goes after One Network, a company involved in a massive fraud and corruption case in Korea.

programme.title: The City of Violence
programme.desc: When a detective returns to his hometown for an old friend's funeral, he gets mixed in with the local gangsters and teams up with his old friends to avenge his death.

programme.title: Sori: Voice From the Heart
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: Innocent Witness
programme.desc: A housekeeper is charged with murder. Her attorney is surprised to learn the only witness to the crime is a teenage girl with Asperger's. Will the girl be able to provide a valid statement?

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Heung-Boo: the Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: The Whispering
programme.desc: A woman and her boyfriend are among a group of students who are on a trip to celebrate their graduation. They wander into an abandoned amusement park and discover the 'House of Horrors'.

programme.title: Athena: Goddess of War
programme.desc: Set in the same murky world as IRIS, a new group of agents must face off against terrorists and untangle a dangerous conspiracy threatening national security.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: Very Ordinary Couple
programme.desc: A couple working in the same bank broke up but continue to see each other in workplace. They couldn't help but pay attention to each other even more than they were dating...

programme.title: Wok the World Ep01
programme.desc: 'Demon Chef' Alvin Leung and his students are travelling to different countries to explore various local Chinese cuisines.
